game_description: A classic snake game where the player controls a growing snake to eat food while avoiding walls and its own tail. The snake grows longer with each food consumed, making navigation increasingly challenging.
core_mechanics: Control snake movement in four directions
Eat food to grow snake length and increase score
Avoid colliding with walls or snake's own body
Snake moves continuously at fixed intervals
Food spawns randomly on the game grid
controls: Arrow keys for directional movement (up, down, left, right)
WASD keys as alternative movement controls
Touch swipe gestures for mobile devices
visual_style: Pixel art with clean, geometric shapes and bright colors on dark background
key_characters: Food items (collectible objects that spawn randomly)
ui_elements: Game over screen with restart button
Pause menu with resume and restart options
Start screen with play button and instructions
victory_defeat_conditions: Defeat: Snake collides with wall boundaries
Defeat: Snake collides with its own body segments
Continuous gameplay: No traditional victory condition, aim for high score
Score increases by 10 points per food item consumed

snake_tail.png - Snake tail segment sprite, 32x32 pixels, used as the final segment of the snake
food_apple.png - Red apple food item sprite, 32x32 pixels, spawns randomly on grid for snake to consume
game_background.png - Dark grid background pattern, tiled across game area
ui_button_play.png - Green play button for start screen, 128x48 pixels, with normal state

ui_button_restart_hover.png - Blue restart button hover state, 128x48 pixels, for mouse interaction
